content.text: What exactly is SoDAS and why should I use it?

SoDAS is your personal DeFi automation suite that uses AI agents to manage your portfolio 24/7. Imagine having a team of expert traders, analysts, and DeFi specialists working for you around the clock, finding the best opportunities while you sleep. Would you like to see a quick demo of how it works?
